column4: I have requested apt-get to install some packages that require a lot of other packages to be uninstalled. I appear to be stuck with "apt-get -f install" removing those packages, and I don't want that. How can I "cancel" the operation that is pending?
on my system, apt-get -f install also attempts to install or uninstall (can't remember) some packages
I can't install anything else until I fix it
I'm only maybe 3 packages away from getting a very conflicted package installed, and now I'm stuck
